text: P. S. Ramamohan Rao (born 31 July 1934) is an Indian politician. He was the Governor of Tamil Nadu from 18 January 2002 to 4 November 2004.Indian states since 1947, (Worldstatesmen, September 16, 2008) He became a member of the Indian Police Service in October 1956. He is a retired Director General of Police of Andhra Pradesh.TN Governor Ramamohan Rao resigns , (The Times of India, September 16, 2008) He was awarded the Indian Police Medal in 1974 and the President's Police Medal in 1982. ==References== Category:Governors of Tamil Nadu Category:1934 births Category:Living people
title: P. S. Ramamohan Rao
